summary: Cheech & Chong are a famous comedy duo made up of Cheech Marin from America and Tommy Chong from Canada. They became popular in the 1970s and 1980s for their funny stand-up shows, music, and movies. Their humor often revolved around the hippie lifestyle, love, and using cannabis. They were a big part of the counterculture movement during that time.
title: Cheech & Chong
